r.s: Extension for the Ingres Relational Database System.
r.d: This extension supports the Ingres Relational Database System.
r.n: This release fixes a number problems discovered since 2.0.1 was released. See below for the list of changes made: - Fix corrupt Ingres MONEY to PHP DOUBLE conversions - Eliminate memory leak when ingres_free_result() is not called - Fix ingres_field_name() so it returns the correct column name - Fix SEGV in php_ii_convert_data() when converting DATE to STRING - Enable the extension to build on Mac OS X and HP-UX - Reduce the number of emalloc calls in php_ii_fetch() - Clean up proto entries in ingres.c - Make ingres_conn_*() and ingres_stmt_* aliases for their ingres_err*() counterparts
